android.health.pedometer
Class StepService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      android.health.pedometer.StepService

public class StepService
extends Service

This is an example of implementing an application service that runs locally in the same process as the application. The StepServiceController and StepServiceBinding classes show how to interact with the service.

Notice the use of the NotificationManager when interesting things happen in the service. This is generally how background services should interact with the user, rather than doing something more disruptive such as calling startActivity().
